DOC.brief_summary: To study the safety and efficacy of CD20 antibody usage followed by CIK transfusion in refractory and/or chemoresistant lymphomas.
DOC.brief_title: Treatment of CD20 Antibody Plus CIK for Patients With Refractory Lymphomas
DOC.detailed_description: Autologous CIK transfusion within 3 days post CD20 antibody treatment.
DOC.criteria: diagnosed as Bcell lymphoma with CD20 positiveness, and need to therapy to refuse the therapy and need not tolerate the therapy
